page.title: 04A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY, EARLY MORNING by Gresham Arnold {I am woken at 7.15am and I get up and {get dressed.At 7.30am I go down for {breakfast. I have cereal and toast for {breakfast (toast is cooked bread).At {7.55am I go to the toilet and wash my {hands and face,then I clean my {teeth.8.30am sees me with my hair {combed and going downstairs.By 8.35am {I have packed my bag and at 8.40am {about to leave the house complete with {games kit (games is sports lesson).At {8.45am I arrive in the car.I get out {and play football until 8.55am when we {go into school.The teacher takes the {register (the register is a way of {finding out who is present).After the {register we go into assembly, {(assembly is where the whole school {assembles to listen to the {headmaster). }
